what: Calculate Anderson et al. Precipitation — calc_anderson_prcp

text: Calculate Anderson et al. Precipitation

title: Calculate Anderson et al. Precipitation — calc_anderson_prcp
Calculate Anderson et al. Precipitation — calc_anderson_prcp
text: daily_avgs Output calc_daily_avgs() closest_dist Output calc_closest_dist() days_before Number days closest distance (default 1) days_after Number days closest distance (default 2)

title: Calculate Anderson et al. Precipitation — calc_anderson_prcp
text: Cumulative precipitation days_before days_after date closest distance geography

title: Calculate Anderson et al. Precipitation — calc_anderson_prcp
code: harvey_anderson_prcp <- calc_anderson_prcp(   harvey_daily_avgs,   harvey_closest_dist ) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'harvey_daily_avgs' not found

what: Download and Filter Outage Data — get_eaglei
title: Download and Filter Outage Data — get_eaglei
text: Data downloaded publically available data published Brelsford et al.

title: Download and Filter Outage Data — get_eaglei
Download and Filter Outage Data — get_eaglei
text: interval Dates get outage data path Path download files

title: Download and Filter Outage Data — get_eaglei
text: Maximum precentage average duration outage county

title: Download and Filter Outage Data — get_eaglei
code: harvey_eaglei <- get_eaglei(   interval = interval(harvey_start, harvey_end + days(5)),   path = "raw-data/eaglei" ) #> The eaglei zip file is 8+ GB, so this will take some time. #> Downloading to: raw-data/eaglei/eaglei.zip #> Error in httr2::req_perform(httr2::request(eaglei_url), path = file_path): Failed to perform HTTP request. #> Caused by error in `curl::curl_fetch_disk()`: #> ! Failed to open file M:\Projects\NIH\UM-ADRD\exposur\docs\reference\raw-data\eaglei\eaglei.zip.

title: Download HURDAT2 Best Track — get_hurdat2
text: Data downloaded NOAA HURDAT2 HTTPS Server

title: Download HURDAT2 Best Track — get_hurdat2
Download HURDAT2 Best Track — get_hurdat2
text: storm_id Storm name caps, dash, year (EX: "HARVEY-2017") path Path download files

title: Download HURDAT2 Best Track — get_hurdat2
text: HURDAT2 best track given storm

title: Download HURDAT2 Best Track — get_hurdat2
code: harvey_hurdat2  <- get_hurdat2(   storm_id = "HARVEY-2017",   path = "raw-data/hurdat2" ) #> Error in httr2::req_perform(httr2::req_url_path_append(httr2::request(hurdat_url),     hurdat_newest), path = file_path): Failed to perform HTTP request. #> Caused by error in `curl::curl_fetch_disk()`: #> ! Failed to open file M:\Projects\NIH\UM-ADRD\exposur\docs\reference\raw-data\hurdat2\hurdat2-atl-1851-2023-042624.txt.
